entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sherbrooke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sherbrooke Airport 03:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 74 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
